title: Analysis: Arizona and Florida show how tough the Senate map is for Democrats
cleanedCompare: democrats going realistic shot winning senate, will win races two states primaries tuesday: arizona florida. lose either one, chance win senate goes down precipitously. arizona florida show tough senate map democrats

metadata.title: Arizona, Florida show how tough Senate map is for Democrats - CNNPolitics
metadata.ogTitle: Arizona and Florida show how tough the Senate map is for Democrats
metadata.twitterTitle: Arizona and Florida show how tough the Senate map is for Democrats
metadata.ogDescription: If Democrats are going to have a realistic shot of winning the Senate, they will have to win the races in two of the states with primaries on Tuesday: Arizona and Florida. If they lose either one, their chance to win the Senate goes down precipitously.

metadata.title: John McCain's death casts shadow over Arizona primary - CBS News
metadata.description: Arizona voters went to the polls Tuesday to nominate a candidate to replace Sen. Jeff Flake. The primary comes days after the death of the state's other senator, John MCCain. CBS News chief congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes reports.

metadata.twitterTitle: Trump warns evangelicals of 'violence' if GOP loses in the midterms
metadata.ogDescription: President Donald Trump, facing scrutiny for hush money payments to a porn star and a former Playboy model, pleaded with evangelical leaders for political help during closed-door remarks on Monday, warning of dire consequences to their congregations should Republicans lose in November's midterm elections.

metadata.ogTitle: Republican senators wary of renaming Russell Building for McCain
metadata.description: “We’ve honored John McCain, but Richard Russell was an icon,” said Alabama Sen. Richard Shelby. Russell was considered a master of the Senate, but was also a segregationist opponent of civil rights.
